label: RegisteredTax
comment: A registered tax or duty system pertaining to an authority.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying a currency of this cash used for payment.
The indication of whether or not this registered tax is a customs duty.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A reason, expressed as text, for exemption from this registered tax.
The code specifying the exemption reason for this registered tax.
A jurisdiction, expressed as text, for this registered tax.
The code specifying the type of registered tax.

referencedBy.comment: The registered tax associated with this tax registration.
